snippet: Oil prices rose after the International Energy Agency predicted drillers would cut production this year.
abstract: Markets rise following five-day slump, as oil and gas stocks are buoyed by upswing in oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices rose after the International Energy Agency predicted drillers would cut production this year.

headline.main: Rally for Oil Companies Snaps 5-Day Losing Streak
